name: Panel
bestPractices: Use Panel to group related content and provide visual separation.
Choose variant='alt' when you want a transparent surface with an outline.
Prefer theme tokens for backgrounds; if you set a custom background ensure text maintains contrast.
Use presets to standardize repeating styles; avoid duplicating sx across pages.
Reserve fullWidth for sections that should span the container; otherwise, anchor with alignX.
Center content with centerContent for compact UI elements, not long-form text blocks.
Nest Panels judiciously to create hierarchy; keep padding consistent using spacing tokens.

examples.title: Alt on backgroundAlt surface
examples.code: <Box background={theme.colors['backgroundAlt']} sx={{ padding: theme.spacing(1) }}><Panel variant="alt" sx={{ padding: theme.spacing(1) }}><Typography>Outline contrasts backgroundAlt</Typography></Panel></Box>

examples.title: Background + padding
examples.code: <Panel background={theme.colors['secondary']} sx={{ padding: theme.spacing(1) }}><Typography>Readable on themed background</Typography></Panel>
